description: RESH & EASY With Ben's Original Poké Bowl Asian Inspired Soy & Ginger Rice, you can create a delicious base for a meal that's ready in 60 seconds. Easy to cook and eat.
name: Soy & Ginger Salmon Poke Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt 180g pkt Ben's Original Poké Bowl Asian Inspired Soy & Ginger Microwave Rice Pouch

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, prepare rice according to packet instructions. Place rice in a bowl. Arrange cabbage, cucumber and salmon over rice. Serve sprinkled with onion and chilli.
Meanwhile, prepare rice according to packet instructions. Place rice in a bowl. Arrange cabbage, cucumber and salmon over rice. Serve sprinkled with onion and chilli.
